name: Alzheimersimulation
tagline: Agent-based simulation of Alzheimer's disease spread
body:
## Agent-based simulation of Alzheimer's disease spread 

Alzheimer's disease is one of the most important mental illnesses. It is posited that more than 25% of the population is affected by mental disease during their lifetime. Each patient draws resources from the economy concerned. Therefore, it is important to quantify the potential economic threat.

### Models can be found here:
[C# Project](https://github.com/dolezalondrej/AlzheimerSimulationCsharp)

[RUST Project](https://github.com/Pscheidl/AlzheimerSimulationRust)

[Stella Project](https://github.com/RichardCimler/AlzheimerSimulationStella)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
